CSGO is an absolute gold mine. I 10/10 recommend this game to anyone looking for a quick shooter game to pass time on and have a lot of fun. There is a little bit of toxicity but what online game doesn't have any. I have only just hit 100 hours of CSGO and I have enjoyed every minute of the game. The team does a fantastic job of catching the cheaters in no time at all. It is a very community based game, if you want to have fun go in with a positive attitude, a negative attitude ruins the game for you and everyone in your loby, dont be that one person... All in all I recommend this game %100. Good Luck Have Fun!!!
